**PR Review Checklist**

*Code*
- [ ] Readability (naming matters)
- [x] DRY
- [x] short methods
- [x] Single Responsibility (decoupling)
- [ ] scalability / efficiency

*Some Heading ???*
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Security

*Quality Assurance*
- [ ] Unit tests (created, updated)
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] End-to-end tests
